content.question: What two things does Catullus ask the gods to do in lines 3-4 (Di . . . animo)? Write out and translate two Latin clauses to support your answer.

frqParts.text: What two things does Catullus ask the gods to do in lines 3-4 (Di . . . animo)? Write out and translate two Latin clauses to support your answer.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
